sn12.16:2.1: In jarāmaraṇassa ce bhikkhu, bhikkhu can be read as either vocative or nominative. At SN 12.67:9.1 we find jarāmaraṇassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhu, where āvuso is the vocative and bhikkhu is nominative. If bhikkhu was the vocative here, it would result in a repeated bhikkhu bhikkhu. I suspect one bhikkhu was dropped in error to avoid this, so translate as nominative.
